title: Real Madrid star Pepe having second thoughts over Chinese Super League switch over rule change in amount of foreign players

organizations.name: efl pepe china crisis real madrid

text:
EFL Pepe China Crisis Real Madrid star Pepe having second thoughts over Chinese Super League switch over rule change in amount of foreign players 
The Portuguese defender has been offered a lucrative deal to join Hebei China Fortune but the new rule limiting foreign stars has made Pepe think again by Warren Haughton
